p: To confirm the new physical picture of molecular quantum transitions, based on the concept of dozy chaos, it is of great interest to carry out experiments on its direct detection [ 15, 18, 33, 34, 35, 36, 96]. In this regard, it would be interesting, for example, to register the loss of regularity of the structure of a molecule in its chaotic transient state [ 96], using modern X-ray free electron lasers [ 141].
